title: Expert: What the EMV switch means for businesses, customers
content:
BizReport 

In just a few weeks US businesses will make the EMV switch; this switch is supposed to ensure the security of credit cards and reduce fraudulent purchases. But many businesses and customers aren't sure how the switch will impact them. Seth Ruden, US. Senior Fraud Consultant of ACI Worldwide, offers his advice.
